topic: 3. Which of these are characteristics of a good design?
options: exhibits strong coupling between its modules
implements all requirements in the analysis model
includes test cases for all components
provides a complete picture of the software
topic_cn: 3. 以下哪些是良好设计的特征？
options_cn: 模块之间表现出强耦合
实现了分析模型中的所有需求
为所有组件都包含测试用例
提供了软件的完整图景
